mapper.select: SELECT ec.id, ec.title, ec.cover, ec.price, ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum, et.name AS teacherName, es1.title AS subjectLevelOne, es2.title AS subjectLevelTwo FROM vesns_edu.edu_course ec INNER JOIN vesns_edu.edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id INNER JOIN vesns_edu.edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_parent_id = es1.id INNER JOIN vesns_edu.edu_subject es2 ON ec.subject_id = es2.id WHERE ec.id = #{id};
